name: synchroneity
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact of things happening or being done at the same time or speed: These records suggest synchroneity with the volcanic activity in the basin and elsewhere. Exact synchroneity is not a requirement.
More examplesFewer examplesThere is no convincing evidence for such global synchroneity of geological sequences.The emphasis was on the evident synchroneity of carbonate deposits.Despite its attraction as a hypothesis, the model fails to account for this apparent synchroneity.This data demonstrates the worldwide synchroneity of these climatic events and their frequency.
